div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in https://interoperabilidad.minsal.cl/fhir/ig/tei/CodeSystem/CSTipoObservacionMinsal version 📦0.2.2

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server)
CodeDisplay
84100007

Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server)
CodeDisplay
101720-1
95385-1

description.value: Estas son algunas de las observaciones que se pueden realizar en un encuentro, que permiten dar antecedentes a la interconsulta.
